channel.title: Quick, MAYBE stupid question
channel.description: hey, if i make a new account on my computer, send my files to it, run the server on that account...log off with the programs still running and go onto my admin account...will that help me at all or is that just not gonna do anything good for me?

item.title: Quick, MAYBE stupid question
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

I would think the other account with go into a sleep mode.

Read full topic

item.title: Quick, MAYBE stupid question
item.dc:creator: @dd1 dd
item.description:
@dd1 wrote:

[quote=“omg ffs ownd, post:3, topic:177126”]umm…

windows allows you to have a certain amount of users for your computer. theres an admin and then a branch of other regular people. i however own this computer so i am of course admin, i was wondering IF i can create an account on windows, log INTO that account…start my server, log off with the files(the server moron)still running…go onto my admin(regular account) and do what i want so the server has a less chance of lagging.[/quote]

You don’t log off, switch accs.

Read full topic
